200.description: Return info with free requests etc.

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

402.description: Your account has no more requests. Request exceeded. Please buy bigger plan

403.description: Cant download page, file robots.txt in requested server block our robot

429.description: Too many requests or Request limit for domain

post.summary: Create new project, after that you can add urls with parameters to processing and wait for final files to download
post.description: Add new project to processing. You will be notification by email when project will be finished. You can also can add urls via our dashboard: https://webshotapi.com/dashboard/projects/

201.description: If created new project return project object

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

get.description: Get projects paginated by 10 projects per request

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Projects list are paginated. Every page has max 10 projects

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Project id

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

patch.description: Update existing project. You can also can check our dashboard: https://webshotapi.com/dashboard/projects/

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Project id

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

delete.description: Delete project and all downloaded urls

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Project id

200.description: Return http status 200 and object {deleted: true} when successful delete project

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

post.summary: Add new urls with params to project.
post.description: Add new links to project. In easy way you can send all your urls to our system. All links will be added to queue. If server will found duplicates urls that will set those urls to fetch again. You can also can check our dashboard: https://webshotapi.com/dashboard/projects/

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Project id

requestBody.description: Send array of urls for add to project

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

get.description: Get urls list from project. List are paginated by 50 urls per request

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Project id

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Urls list are paginated. Urls are group by max 50 urls per request.

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

get.operationId: (GET) Get url from project by id
get.description: Check that url was processed and is available for download

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Project id

parameters.name: url_id
parameters.description: Project url id

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

delete.operationId: (DELETE) Delete url from project by id
delete.description: Delete url from queue. Warning if url was already processing you can not remove that url.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Project id

parameters.name: url_id
parameters.description: Project url id

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

post.summary: Process url again by our robot
post.description: Send request for process url again

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Project id

parameters.name: url_id
parameters.description: Project url id

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

post.summary: POST Take website screenshot, save as JPG, PNG, PDF or JSON
post.description: Take screenshot of website and return JPG/PNG/PDF/JSON if you selected JSON format server you will receive JSON file with link to screenshot. Be careful with wait_for_selector and wait_for_xpath parameters. Timeout for those arguments is 20 seconds

parameters.name: response_type
parameters.description: Select response type with screenshot image. Server can send to you image as binary file or JSON file with link attribute to image hosted on our server.

schema.title: PNG output
schema.description: Return image output as png format

Accept-Encoding.description: Encoding in gzip. Compress only when return json and clietn send accept encoding gzip

X-Request-Status-Code.description: This is status code sending from browser. NOT OUR API. For example: You sent request to get data from website which does not exist. Our api return code 200, this header will be have value 404.

X-Is-Cache.description: Send header with info that request was return from cache. 0: fresh data, 1: data from cache

X-Quota-Limit.description: Request limit in actual purchased subscription package.

X-Quota-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the purchased package

X-Quota-Date.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the current rate limit window resets

X-Max-Concurrent-Requests.description: How many requests you can send in same time

200.description: Response completed. Response format depends of Accept request header

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

402.description: Your account has no more requests. Request exceeded. Please buy bigger plan

403.description: Cant download page, file robots.txt in requested server block our robot

429.description: Too many requests or Request limit for domain

get.summary: GET Take website screenshot, save as JPG, PNG, PDF or JSON
get.description: Take screenshot of website and return JPG/PNG/PDF/JSON if you selected JSON format server you will receive JSON file with link to screenshot. Be careful with wait_for_selector and wait_for_xpath parameters. Timeout for those arguments is 20 seconds

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: Link to website

parameters.name: image_type
parameters.description: Select screenshot image output format

parameters.name: remove_modals
parameters.description: Remove all modals, popup with info, ads, cookies etc before take screenshot. So remove all elements which cover the website.

parameters.name: ads
parameters.description: Remove all ads from website.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Set the page width (Viewport) in pixels. Set 0 if you want to ignore this param

parameters.name: thumbnail_width
parameters.description: If you want to make a thumbnail after taking the screenshot, enter its width in pixels. The ratio will be kept.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Set the page height (Viewport) in pixels. Set 0 if you want to ignore this param

parameters.name: no_cache
parameters.description: If you download the same page through our api with the same parameters for the second time, our server will return the data from the cache so as not to charge your account twice. If you still want to download the fresh page, you can do so via this option. The data in the cache is stored for 24 hours

parameters.name: scroll_to_bottom
parameters.description: If you want to scroll to the bottom of the page, check this option for the browser to load all photos

parameters.name: retina
parameters.description: This will set the device scale factor = 2, producing a high resolution retina screenshot.

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: The delay, in seconds, to wait after the page is loaded. Maximum 10 seconds

parameters.name: wait_for_selector
parameters.description: Before taking the screenshot, wait for the loading of the element with the given css selector. The timeout for this operation is 20 seconds.

parameters.name: wait_for_xpath
parameters.description: Before taking the screenshot, wait for the loading of the element with the given Xpath selector. The timeout for this operation is 20 seconds.

parameters.name: image_quality
parameters.description: Set the compression rate for the JPG file. PNG does not support compression. Range: 0-100

parameters.name: transparent_background
parameters.description: Original background will be removed. Screenshot will be taken with transparent background. Works only with PNG format.

parameters.name: user_agent
parameters.description: Enter a valid browser User-Agent HTTP header value you want to emulate
parameters.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.88 Safari/537.36

schema.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.88 Safari/537.36

parameters.name: accept_language
parameters.description: Enter valid Accept-Language HTTP header

parameters.name: cookies
parameters.description: Provide a list of cookies and values. The cookies will be sent to the server before the screenshot is taken. Example:cookie_var=value;cookie_var2=value. Cookies for GET request have to be URL encoded.

parameters.name: headers
parameters.description: Provide a list of HTTP headers. Headers will be sent to the server before the screenshot is taken. Example:X-hello=value;X-var=value. Headers for GET request have to be URL encoded.

parameters.name: full_page
parameters.description: Check this option if you want to take a screenshot of the entire page

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: Enter the time zone for the browser.

parameters.name: fail_statuscode
parameters.description: Enter the http codes for which the browser should not screenshot. You can enter the codes by separating them with a comma or enter a range. If the page doesn't exist then don't take a picture. Code example: 403,404, 500-511

parameters.name: extract_text
parameters.description: Get plain text of the page right after rendering. All html tags are removed.

parameters.name: extract_html
parameters.description: Download the page's html code as soon as all Javascript is loaded.

parameters.name: extract_selectors
parameters.description: Export all html elements and Xpath selectors for them.

parameters.name: extract_words
parameters.description: Export all words from the page with the positions (x, y, width, height) for each word. Thanks to this you can build a map of words placed on the page.

parameters.name: extract_style
parameters.description: Additionally, for each HTML element you can export its css styles after rendering and loading all scripts. https://webshotapi.com/blog/how-to-scraper-css-styles-from-website/ for 0 - dont extract words. 1 - Extract primary css properties for elements, 2 - Extract all css properties for elements

parameters.name: capture_element_selector
parameters.description: Take a screenshot only of the element on the page that has the CSS selector. This is a useful option if you want to take a photo of, for example, a table on the page.

parameters.name: injection_css
parameters.description: CSS string will be added to the page before the screenshot is taken. For GET request have to be URL encoded.

parameters.name: injection_css_url
parameters.description: CSS file will be added to the page before the screenshot is taken. For GET request have to be URL encoded.

parameters.name: injection_js
parameters.description: Javascript string will be added to the page before the screenshot is taken. For GET request have to be URL encoded.

parameters.name: response_type
parameters.description: Select response type with screenshot image. Server can send to you image as binary file or JSON file with link attribute to image hosted on our server.

schema.title: PNG output
schema.description: Return image output as png format

Accept-Encoding.description: Encoding in gzip. Compress only when return json and clietn send accept encoding gzip

X-Request-Status-Code.description: This is status code sending from browser. NOT OUR API. For example: You sent request to get data from website which does not exist. Our api return code 200, this header will be have value 404.

X-Is-Cache.description: Send header with info that request was return from cache. 0: fresh data, 1: data from cache

X-Quota-Limit.description: Request limit in actual purchased subscription package.

X-Quota-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the purchased package

X-Quota-Date.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the current rate limit window resets

X-Max-Concurrent-Requests.description: How many requests you can send in same time

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

402.description: Your account has no more requests. Request exceeded. Please buy bigger plan

403.description: Cant download page, file robots.txt in requested server block our robot

429.description: Too many requests or Request limit for domain

post.summary: POST Extract selectors, words and styles
post.description: Uniqe software to extract all selectors for all HTML elements from website with css styles after browser rendering and execute all scripts. Additionally you can extract all words with positions(x,y,width, height, offset from previous word). Thank that you can build words map of website.

Accept-Encoding.description: Encoding in gzip. Compress only when return json and clietn send accept encoding gzip

X-Request-Status-Code.description: This is status code sending from browser. NOT OUR API. For example: You sent request to get data from website which does not exist. Our api return code 200, this header will be have value 404.

X-Quota-Limit.description: Request limit in actual purchased subscription package.

X-Quota-Date.description: The UNIX timestamp at which the current rate limit window resets

X-Max-Concurrent-Requests.description: How many requests you can send in same time

401.description: Access denied. Wrong token or account is disabled

402.description: Your account has no more requests. Request exceeded. Please buy bigger plan

403.description: ant download page, file robots.txt in requested server block our robot

429.description: Too many requests or Request limit for domain

get.summary: POST Extract selectors, words and styles
get.description: Uniqe software to extract all selectors for all HTML elements from website with css styles after browser rendering and execute all scripts. Additionally you can extract all words with positions(x,y,width, height, offset from previous word). Thank that you can build words map of website.

info.title: Webshotapi Server
info.description: Api for WebShotApi. Take website screenshot and extract words, selectors and css styles from websites.

message.description: Single string or array of string with errors
example: link must be a string value

quota_date.description: Until when the subscription is valid

quota_remaining.description: Requests remaining in valid subscription plan

quota_limit.description: All requests in valid subscription plan

max_concurrent_requests.description: How much concurrent requests you can send to our api in same time

added.description: Project added date in UTC ISO-8601 format

updated.description: Project added date in UTC ISO-8601 format

executed.description: How many urls in project executed

no_executed.description: How many urls in project was not executed

errors.description: How many urls in project was executed with error

added.description: Project added date in UTC ISO-8601 format

updated.description: Project added date in UTC ISO-8601 format

added.description: Project added date in UTC ISO-8601 format

updated.description: Project added date in UTC ISO-8601 format

deleted.description: Return true when project was deleted

response_http_code.description: Http status code return from our api.

errors_sum.description: When api trying to get url and received error 500 or 400 etc our server will try 2 more time in next 30 minutes.

status.description: Info that url was processing or not. This attribute can have 3 values, yes - processing by server, no - waiting in queue for processing, error - was error during the processing

completed_file_url.description: When url will be processed you can download completed output file. This attribute has direct link. When url is not completed. Attribute has empty string

last_error_info.description: If an error occurs while our robot is making a request, an error message will be saved

last_error_http_code.description: If an error occurs while our robot is making a request, an error code will be saved

response_http_code.description: Http status code return from our api.

errors_sum.description: When api trying to get url and received error 500 or 400 etc our server will try 2 more time in next 30 minutes.

status.description: Info that url was processing or not. This attribute can have 3 values, yes - processing by server, no - waiting in queue for processing, error - was error during the processing

completed_file_url.description: When url will be processed you can download completed output file. This attribute has direct link. When url is not completed. Attribute has empty string

last_error_info.description: If an error occurs while our robot is making a request, an error message will be saved

last_error_http_code.description: If an error occurs while our robot is making a request, an error code will be saved

remove_modals.description: Remove all modals, popup with info, ads, cookies etc before take screenshot. So remove all elements which cover the website.

width.description: Set the page width (Viewport) in pixels. Set 0 if you want to ignore this param

thumbnail_width.description: If you want to make a thumbnail after taking the screenshot, enter its width in pixels. The ratio will be kept.

height.description: Set the page height (Viewport) in pixels. Set 0 if you want to ignore this param

no_cache.description: If you download the same page through our api with the same parameters for the second time, our server will return the data from the cache so as not to charge your account twice. If you still want to download the fresh page, you can do so via this option. The data in the cache is stored for 24 hours

scroll_to_bottom.description: If you want to scroll to the bottom of the page, check this option for the browser to load all photos

retina.description: This will set the device scale factor = 2, producing a high resolution retina screenshot.

delay.description: The delay, in seconds, to wait after the page is loaded. Maximum 10 seconds

wait_for_selector.description: Before taking the screenshot, wait for the loading of the element with the given css selector. The timeout for this operation is 20 seconds.

wait_for_xpath.description: Before taking the screenshot, wait for the loading of the element with the given Xpath selector. The timeout for this operation is 20 seconds.

image_quality.description: Set the compression rate for the JPG file. PNG does not support compression. Range: 0-100

transparent_background.description: Original background will be removed. Screenshot will be taken with transparent background. Works only with PNG format.

user_agent.description: Enter a valid browser User-Agent HTTP header value you want to emulate
user_agent.default: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.88 Safari/537.36
user_agent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.88 Safari/537.36

cookies.description: Provide a list of cookies and values. The cookies will be sent to the server before the screenshot is taken. Example:cookie_var=value;cookie_var2=value. Cookies for GET request have to be URL encoded.

headers.description: Provide a list of HTTP headers. Headers will be sent to the server before the screenshot is taken. Example:X-hello=value;X-var=value. Headers for GET request have to be URL encoded.

full_page.description: Check this option if you want to take a screenshot of the entire page

timezone.description: Enter the time zone for the browser.

extract_html.description: Download the page's html code as soon as all Javascript is loaded.

extract_selectors.description: Export all html elements and Xpath selectors for them.

extract_words.description: Export all words from the page with the positions (x, y, width, height) for each word. Thanks to this you can build a map of words placed on the page.

extract_style.description: Additionally, for each HTML element you can export its css styles after rendering and loading all scripts. https://webshotapi.com/blog/how-to-scraper-css-styles-from-website/ for 0 - dont extract words. 1 - Extract primary css properties for elements, 2 - Extract all css properties for elements

injection_js.description: Javascript string will be added to the page before the screenshot is taken. For GET request have to be URL encoded.

fail_statuscode.description: Enter the http codes for which the browser should not screenshot. You can enter the codes by separating them with a comma or enter a range. If the page doesn't exist then don't take a picture. Code example: 403,404, 500-511

x.description: X position of word in domdocument

y.description: Y position of word in domdocument

xpath.description: Xpath for HTML element in DOM Document

style.description: If you set params extract_style to 1 or 2, this parameter will be present css styles of HTML element

x.description: X position of word in domdocument

y.description: Y position of word in domdocument

xpath.description: X position of word in domdocument

word.description: Xpath for HTML element in DOM Document where this word in inserted

word_index.description: Index of word in same HTML element start from 0. Example div has 4 words 'Hello in my site'. Hello has index 0, in has index 1, my has index 2, site has index 3

offset.description: Distance from the previous word on the X axis in pixels in same parent HTML element.

status_code.description: This is status code sending from browser. NOT OUR API. For example: You sent request to get data from website which does not exist. Our api return code 200, this property will be have value 404.

html.description: Html code of page after rendering

text.description: Clean text without html codes after rendering
text.example: Welcome in our page\nToday is Monday..

selectors.description: Array of selectors extracted from website

words.description: Array of words extracted from website
